name: Melissa Palmer
text: Conveniently located on main strip. The place was clean and pizza was good. Would have gave 5 stars but employees were not very friendly.

name: Tim M
text: Always friendly staff, great take and bake pizza and has gluten free crusts!

name: Adam Roberts
text: Great pizza, bit different because of the. Take and bake setup, easy to get in and out though. Takes EBT for folks that have that and want an "eating out" feel.

name: Wayne Carlson
text: This place makes everything fresh every day. Their Mediterranean chicken pizza is awesome.  Yes you have to bake it at home but then you know it will be hot when served.

name: Al Jackson
text: Papa Murphy's pizza is so good it's worth the two and a half hour drive just to get one

name: Jim Harris
text: This is a great concept. Never cold soggy pizza. Fresh when you want it.

name: William Henderson
text: Our Spinach and Feta Pizza was absolutely delicious! We loved the 5 Cheese Bread as well. Ingredients were super fresh. What we loved most was the outstanding and friendly customer service we received from both the manager and associates. We will most certainly come back again.

text: Was told this was the best place to get pizza in the area by my Italian friend who knows how to make pizza and has ran a restaurant before so I made sure I stopped next time I was in town. She was right on! I love thin crust and ordered a …More

text: Wonderful Option for Freshly made pizzas to enjoy in the comfort of being at home, with family and friends.

name: Deana Olson
text: Love all types but especially stuffed.  Unfortunately the last two times ordered online the order was incorrect or the last one never got through even though I was told to pick up in half hour.

text: Food was fresh as always however my order was placed online and was not ready at pickup time.  Additionally, they were out of the salad I ordered and also the type of soda I I ordered. I realize it was busy and they offered substitutions …More

text: I always get exactly what I ordered. All of the staff is very welcoming and polite.

text: Always pleasant and quick.  The order is correct and serv ed with a smile!

name: Lori Hisel
text: One of my favorite places for pizza dinner. Fresh ingredients and plenty of them.  Good choices.  Their cookie dough is good also, and they have pretty decent salads.  You may have a wait depending on when you go.  Phoning your order in ahead of time helps.

text: I love being able to watch it put together, and cooking it at home is great for entertaining guests.

name: Michele L
text: Great pizza & service! If you have gluten issues try the gluten free crust. This is the best gluten free pizza I've found. I really like baking my own pizza. It's ready when I am. Try the salads...made fresh and lots of goodies. This store is always clean and the staff are friendly.

name: John Lerma
text: Love being able to grab up a pizza and bake it right after work.
